name: Bioshock Infinite: Clash in the Clouds
name_original: Bioshock Infinite: Clash in the Clouds
description:
Bioshock Infinite: Clash in the Clouds is an action-shooter game developed by Irrational Games. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by 2K Games. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Bioshock Infinite: Clash in the Clouds on PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
